text: "Around the World (La La La La La)" is a 2000 debut single by German Eurodance group ATC (an abbreviation of A Touch of Class) and is from their debut studio album Planet Pop. It topped the single charts in Austria, Germany, Poland, Romania and Switzerland and made the top 10 in Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Finland, Hungary, the Netherlands and Sweden. The song is a cover of the Russian hit "Pesenka" by Ruki Vverh! in 1998. In 2019, Dutch DJ R3hab released a cover version of "All Around the World (La La La)". == Track listings == * European CD single 1 # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (radio version) – 3:35 # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (acoustic mix) – 3:20 * European CD single 2 # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (radio version) – 3:35 # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (club mix) – 5:37 * European maxi-CD and Australian CD single # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (radio version) – 3:35 # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (alternative radio version) – 3:31 # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (acoustic mix) – 3:20 # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (Rüegsegger#Wittwer club mix) – 5:37 # "World in Motion" – 3:31 * European maxi-CD single (Remixes) # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (Rüegsegger#Wittwer club mix—short) – 3:44 # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (RNT mix) – 3:08 # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (extended club mix) – 4:58 # "Around the World (La La La La La)" (Triage club mix) – 5:10 * US 12-inch single :A1.
